p: Prior to the advances in ELR technology in the USA, manual data entry of paper laboratory reports was the standard procedure for collecting data on viral hepatitis infections. However, manual data entry of paper laboratory reports is both labor intensive and costly. ELR has been shown to identify almost three times as many hepatitis C cases as the traditional paper-based method, and, on average, identified those cases nearly 5.5 days earlier than the conventional method [ 99].
